author: legoguy2805
title: New and sealed, in a charity shop for 25p!
review:
I got this in a charity shop for 25p, new and sealed. It's quite fun. The skateboarder guy has a handle attached to his back. It comes in a plastic bag, with fold-out instructions.

Pros:
Skateboarder with helmet and skateboard
Ramp

Cons:
The handle attached to his back looks strange

Overall, 5/5
